question: Which of the following organisations has recently announced to buy farm stubble from farmers to prevent burning of stubble by farmers thereby reducing air pollution?
explanation: Recently, the Ministry of Power has directed NTPC Ltd to source up to 10 per cent of its thermal fuel requirements from straw pellets, especially buying those generated in Punjab and Haryana during the winter season. The move is aimed at luring farmers away from stubble burning. As per recent reports from NASA, crop stubble burning is the major reason behind smog pollution in Delhi.
